name: Stumbling Ride - Biker Racing Game
description:
Bike Racing is a craze now a day and people love to simulate there dreams of riding using games.
Many games on racing has been made in past 5 years but this is not a racing game means you are not running out of time or you don't have to compete with other bikers.

This is all about surviving to the end of journey. The journey is not easy as there are very steep paths and ups and downs on the way just like the life where we faces a lot of crises and we need to control our way of surviving. All you need to do is control your bike as it has the accelerator and back gears.

The paths are designed in a way that you cannot just go and cross them as u want but they are challenging and challenge you on every corner.

Test your patience.
Test your skills.
Test your control.
Test your intelligence.

There are multiple beautiful but irritating roads and certainly a lot of hurdles like animals (dinosaurs, dead mans and more).
Also flying black smotchies those will scare you and also make your journey tough and tiring but you have to pass them patiently and go to the finish. Best of luck with your journey.

Features:
1 - Easy bike controls.
2 - Multiple curvy and dangerous paths.
3 - Unknown creatures.
4 - Sound Effects to make you live in.
5 - Competitive and testing environment.
